Protected File	

Anonymous users need to provide a valid e-mail address to download a protected file.


Initial development by Plone Solutions AS
    http://www.plonesolutions.com

Sponsored and further development by Simula Research Laboratory AS
    http://www.simula.no
    Martin Opstad Reistadbakk (mor@simula.no)

Additional contributors
    Anonymous (haskell_noob-opera@yahoo.de)
